panel.label: If you are on a team after the game starts, you will be unable to join the other team through any means other than the spawn queue.

frame.onshow: If(!StringEquals(GetCurrentChatMessage(), ''), Split(Set('_lobby_chat_type', GetCurrentChatType() # 'Chat'), ShowOnly('Chat' # GetCurrentChatType() # 'Button'))); SetFocusName('lobby_chat_box');

textbuffer.name: lobby_chat_buffer
textbuffer.ontrigger1: If(!game_chat_nick, CreateString('game_chat_nick', '')); Set('game_chat_nick', SubString(param, SearchString(param, '] ', 0) + 4, SearchString(param, ':', 0) - SearchString(param, '] ', 0) - 4)); If(!StringEquals(game_chat_nick, 'Server Message'), If(!*('Ignore_' # game_chat_nick), Cmd('Set Ignore_' # game_chat_nick # ' false'))); If(IsVisible(), If(!*('Ignore_' # game_chat_nick), TextBufferCmd(param)));

listbox.name: buddy_listbox

panel.label: You are not currently in a clan.

listbox.name: clan_listbox_member
listbox.ondoubleclick: if((StringLength(this) gt 2) and !StringEquals(this, GetAccountName()), Call('lobby_chat_box', 'SetInputLine(\'/w \' # ui_lastSelectedUser # \' \');')); SetFocusName('lobby_chat_box');

listbox.name: clan_listbox_officer
listbox.ondoubleclick: if((StringLength(this) gt 2) and !StringEquals(this, GetAccountName()), Call('lobby_chat_box', 'SetInputLine(\'/w \' # ui_lastSelectedUser # \' \');')); SetFocusName('lobby_chat_box');

listbox.name: clan_listbox_leader
listbox.ondoubleclick: if((StringLength(this) gt 2) and !StringEquals(this, GetAccountName()), Call('lobby_chat_box', 'SetInputLine(\'/w \' # ui_lastSelectedUser # \' \');')); SetFocusName('lobby_chat_box');

instance.name: round_button2
instance.label: Spectate
instance.onclick: If(LobbyPhase == 5, ShowWidget('Spectate_Confirm'), If(GetLocalTeam() == 0, Split(Spawn(), HideLobby(), HideMenu()), Team(0)));

listbox.name: spectator_listbox
listbox.ondoubleclick: if((StringLength(this) gt 1) and !StringEquals(this, GetAccountName()), Call('lobby_chat_box', 'SetInputLine(\'/w \' # ui_lastSelectedUser # \' \');')); SetFocusName('lobby_chat_box');

panel.label: Are you sure you want to disconnect?
If you leave before the game is finished you will not recieve the 10 experience point per minute bonus and you will lose any automatic wins you recieved.
Are you sure you want to spectate?
If you spawn as a spectator after the game has started, you will no longer be able to join a team for the duration of the game.
